gmsh - basic truncated source of libGmsh (2.9.1) with modified build script

Clipper - an open source freeware polygon clipping library v6.2.1 (31 October 2014)

scpack -- Schwarz-Christoffel transform into a unit disk (http://www.netlib.org/conformal/)

dscpack -- the schwarz-christoffel transformation for doubly connected regions
           author:
           Chenglie Hu   april,1994 (revised july,1995) at Wichita State Univ.
                         a further revision was done at fhsu (july, 1997)
